overview: When Faith (Jassie) finds out her two good friends are looking to get pregnant, she offers up the services of her husband, Alan (Randy Spears). Completely dedicated to his wife, Alan doesn't want to entertain the idea of cheating. But these sexy ladies won't take no for an answer and what follows is a hilarious cat and mouse chase where the girls try anything and everything to secure his seed!
title: What Are Friends For?
